title: Star Trekâ„¢ Trexels v2.0.1 mod
description:
*** Take command of YOUR very own starship! ***

The USS Valiant has been destroyed by an unknown attacker, and Starfleet has chosen YOU to continue its mission deep within a mysterious area of space known as the Trexelian Expanse. Build your ship, choose your crew, learn the fate of the Valiant, and explore the Expanse in the name of the Federation.

Good luck. Starfleet out.

â€œSPACE: THE FINAL FRONTIERâ€
Get ready to explore the Galaxy like no one has before, as you journey across a vast galactic map!

BUILD YOUR SHIP
YOU decide how your ship is built. Choose from dozens of different room types and modifications, and put those red shirts to work!

CHOOSE YOUR CREW
Assign officers to key posts, train them to increase their abilities, and send them on exciting Away Missions!

ICONIC CHARACTERS AND TECHNOLOGY
A temporal rift in the Expanse has caused old foes and surprising new allies to find their way into this unexplored region of space. Luckily, youâ€™ve also got the brand-new LCARS interface to aid your mission!

AN AUTHENTIC STAR TREKâ„¢ EXPERIENCE
Featuring narration by the one and only George Takei, the game also includes the original music from Star Trekâ„¢: The Original Series!

COMING SOONâ€¦
Faster than you can say, â€œMake it so,â€ look for future updates that will truly take the Trexels experience into the â€˜next generationâ€™â€¦ of mobile games.

Key Features:
Narrated by the one and only George Takei
Music from the original series
Gameplay using a next generation LCARS interface
Unique â€œTrexelatedâ€ art style
Exciting Space Combat and Away Missions
Customize your ship for maximum efficiency

Whatâ€™s new:
- An all NEW game mode-real time, player vs player
- Buy iconic Federation and Alien ships to create a legendary fleet
- Equip your fleet with a a variety of weapons and defensive abilities.
- Officers bring unique tactical maneuvers to battle.
- Challenge other admirals in simulated combat
- Win and advance up the leaderboards
- A complete new sector (sector 12) full of new adventures
- New resource room to generate fleet badges
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Required Android O/S : 4.0+
